name: Became The Hunted
description: Playing as a wolf, you have to navigate your way around a vast dried up sea bed. Build your base, scavenge for food, and follow simple missions whilst you explore around sun bleached rocks and long forgotten ship wrecks. However, you must avoid poachers, unfriendly wolves and many other dangers at all costs. Can you find your cub in time?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 17134 Processor: AMD A10-7860k Memory: 5 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960 4GB Independent DDR5 128Bit Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
